short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows how popular the article you're reading on Hacker News is

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The badge shows the point the article got on Hacker News. Click the badge to open a popup that shows comments on Hacker News. You can also submit an article to Hacker News via the link in the popup if you want to share it with people.
